activities: Personal data received by Victaulic in the necessary and ordinary course of business activities, including personally identifiable information related to prospective, current, and former: employees, vendors, suppliers, and customers. Occasionally, Victaulic may contact customers for market research purposes. When Victaulic is the data controller, notice to the data subject regarding the data collected, processed, used, and transferred and their rights regarding such data is provided in applicable Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policies.

eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

recoursemech: Victaulic maintains a Global Awareness Line for the reporting of complaints and concerns. The reporting system is operated by Global Compliance, a third-party provider. If a complaint cannot be resolved internally, it will be referred to the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
